hevs.gdx2d.lib.physics

Interface BodyInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPhysicsObject, PhysicsBox, PhysicsCircle, PhysicsPolygon, PhysicsStaticBox, PhysicsStaticCircle, PhysicsStaticLine

    public interface BodyInterface
    An interface for the Box2D bodies so that we can work in pixels units and not in meters. Most of the physics operations have been converted to return pixels.

    Used in AbstractPhysicsObject.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry
